price: Wͻkaa sε: Yεbεbͻ mmͻden sε yεbɛnya ho kwan (ama no) wͻ ne papa hͻ, na yεn deε yεbεyɛ.
arabic: قَالُواْ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū sanurāwidu ʿanhu abāhu wa-innā lafāʿilūna
translations: We will try to get permission
